content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Epic Games is nearly a 30-year-old technology company that has some main lines of business which Epam helps contribute:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{\"checked\":false},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Unreal Engine is a suite of creation tools for games and enterprise applications (such as film, automotive design, and architecture). Unreal Engine enables game developers and creators across industries to realize next-generation real-time 3D content and experiences with greater freedom, fidelity, and flexibility than ever before. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{\"checked\":false},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Epic Online Services allows developers to focus on game design while adopting tools running on AWS that have been battle tested at Fortnite scale. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{\"checked\":false},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Metahuman, the new software tool, which is powered by Epic’s Unreal Engine. MetaHuman Creator can craft highly realistic human faces and help power more realistic body movements and facial animations \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{\"checked\":false},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Epic Games Store is a digital video game storefront, which is reshaping game distribution by providing developers with a far greater share of revenues. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{\"checked\":false},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Epic Games creates games like Fortnite and Battle Breakers and has acquired companies including Psyonix (the maker of Rocket League).
